name: My Mother Remarried Into a Family of Vampires
name_original: My Mother Remarried Into a Family of Vampires
description:
Your mother remarries into a family of vampires. While she is away with her husband you spend time with your new siblings and get to know them and slowly grow closer. Some get into danger, others get involved in mysterious things.  Who will you choose?

Made for the Otome Game Jam 2022
